#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, m;
    cin>>t;
    char a[100000];
    int s[100000];
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s", a);
        scanf("%d", &m);
        int l = strlen(a);
        s[0] = (a[0]=='B' ? 1 : 0);
        for(int i=1; i<l; i++)
        {
            s[i] = s[i-1];
            if(a[i]=='B')
                s[i] += 1;
        }
        int min = s[m-1];
        //printf("current min at %d: %d\n", m-1, s[m-1]);
        int j;
        for(int i=m;i<l;i++)
        {
            j = s[i] - s[i-m];
            if(min > j)
                min = j;

            //printf("s[i] = %d, current min at %d: %d\n", s[i], i, min);
        }
        printf("%d\n", min);
    }

}
